newsitem.title: CHINA: CHINA JAN-JULY ALUMINIUM OUTPUT UP 15.1 PCT YR/YR. [CORRECTED 13:00 GMT]
newsitem.headline: CHINA JAN-JULY ALUMINIUM OUTPUT UP 15.1 PCT YR/YR. [CORRECTED 13:00 GMT]

text.p: China produced 1.0196 million tonnes aluminium in the first seven months of this year, up 15.1 percent year-on-year, the China Securities said on Saturday.
China's aluminium output was 181,900 tonnes in July alone, the newspaper quoted the State Statistical Bureau as saying.

Output of aluminium products reached 674,700 tonnes in the first seven months, up by 9.8 percent, it said. Output for July alone was 105,000 tonnes, up by 0.57 percent from June (corrects from "a year ago"), it said.
China's alumina output reached 1.7245 million tonnes in the first sesven months, down 12.3 percent year-on-year, it said.
China produced 248,200 tonnes of alumina in July alone, the newspaper said.
